CustomField.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK (cm_Completed_Application__c)), ISBLANK(Counter_Offer_Letter_Sent__c), ISBLANK(Counteroffer_Received__c), OR( ISBLANK(Incomplete_Date__c), cm_Completed_Application__c>= Incomplete_Date__c)), (cm_Completed_Application__c+ 30), IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK ( Incomplete_Date__c)), ISBLANK(Counter_Offer_Letter_Sent__c), ISBLANK(Counteroffer_Received__c)), (Incomplete_Date__c+ 30), IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Counter_Offer_Letter_Sent__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Counteroffer_Received__c))), ((cm_Completed_Application__c + 30) + (Counteroffer_Received__c - Counter_Offer_Letter_Sent__c)), NULL)))
CustomField.label: Incomplete/Complete Clock
